attributes.title: Ew nope
attributes.review: First off when I opened the app I seen a big dude that looked like the annoying orange and then he scared me so I had to delete the app it is very terrible cause like gen z ain’t going down today my guyyyyyyyyy easy if they ban tik tok we ban trumps website easy like that cause tik tok is literally my life so if you ban it I will be depressed so like trump watch out we coming

attributes.title: Great at first, but..
attributes.review: There were a lot of glitches when I opened this app like I don’t have time for that I have to go walk my pet caterpillar. Because of my Gen Z impatience, I just couldn’t take it. I have to leave a bad review for something like this, it could be a lot better. I’m so sad that such an amazing app doesn’t work. Oh well. Il faut que les États-Unis auront un nouveau président pour 2020.

attributes.title: awful app
attributes.review: this app took HOURS to download and when it was finally downloaded it would start playing dance monkey which is deafening in and of itself, and to have that on top of lil huddy coming out of the app and kidnapping my whole family and taking them to the cheeto puffs bunker!!?!?!?!? i outta sue y’all. worst app ever 0/10 would not recommend.😤😤

Easy to say this app is just terrible.🌸✨😌 I expected to see the president when I downloaded it.💅🏻😈 🥂 Instead I was greeted with a very fat and ugly and deformed looking orange🍊❌🤡🥳🥰 Of I could give the app a negative rating I would 👁👄👁

attributes.title: worst app i’ve ever had 🤮🤮
attributes.review: this app broke my phone completely . it made my phone glitch and it was unbelievably slow . DONT DOWNLOAD . it’s a waste of time . not only did it make my phone go slower but it completely shattered it . my phone couldn’t handle the racism ,, homophobia and misogynistic energy that this app radiated so it blew up . don’t download the orange boy app 🍊🍊

attributes.title: the worst possible app ever 🤮😍😍🥰🙈✨
attributes.review: i seriously tried to download to show my love and support with all my heart towards our amazing president but it took around 3-4 hours 😰 to download and 🤭🤭🤭 I think that’s a bug that should be fixed... 🥵‼️ anyways yea so Donald trump is so beautiful 😍😍 and I’m so glad he is our president 😋 so I tried getting this app but idk now ... ✨✨🥺

attributes.title: The worst app in existence
attributes.review: This app is so glitchy and barley works. The facts it’s made by a CHILD PREDATOR is horrendous. The people on the app is even worse. They condone his actions that are RACIST and HOMOPHOBIC. The app first tracked me down and a bunch of trump supporters came and beat up my black uncle. the app doesn’t even work that well and it’s functions are terrible. If I could give it a lower rating I would

attributes.title: Horrible app!
attributes.review: This app is very horrible. It made my phone glitch a lot, and I regretted downloading it right after I downloaded it! It's a horrible app, and no one should download this app. Get this app taken down immediatly! No one likes it, and whoever does is lying! I hope this review shows you, the app store, and everyone else that this "Donold Dump" app is very bad!

attributes.title: Why would you put out such a bad app?
attributes.review: With all the money this campaign has you would think they would be able to make a better app. Completely trash of an app. I think it should be fixed by taking it off the App Store. It is a disgrace to the word app. If I could give it zero stars I would.

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!!
attributes.review: I downloaded this app with the intention to support my President, Donny Jebron Trump. However as soon as I downloaded the app I received non stop notifications about Trumps new only fans account. I am very disappointed in this app and the fact that I can not afford Mr. Trumps only fans. 😔 In conclusion vote blue in November💙. If trumps try’s to take Tik Tok from us expect us to take his app from him 🤪
